alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dutchess County through 545 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gardnertown, or near Newburgh, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beacon, Pawling, Plattekill, Wappingers Falls, Fishkill, Hopewell Junction, Marlboro, Myers Corner, East Fishkill, Stormville, Swartoutville, Brockway, New Hamburg, Glenham, Beacon Hills, Lomala, Pecksville, Chelsea, Castle Point and Wiccopee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central New York.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess
